questions: Can you elaborate on your experience in Information Technology over the past 6 years?
What specific projects have you worked on that showcase your proficiency in SQL and Python?
How have you utilized AWS in your previous roles?
Can you explain the reasons behind taking a professional gap for personal development?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the IT industry during your gap period?
Have you undertaken any certifications or courses during your gap to enhance your skills?
How do you plan to apply your skills in SQL, Python, and AWS in your future roles?
Can you provide examples of how you have successfully implemented SQL queries or Python scripts in your previous work?
How do you approach problem-solving and troubleshooting in an IT environment?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage deadlines in your work?
